Today in South Devon, Bantham is lighting up with a solid 5 ft @ 8s SW swell and light 5 mph WSW winds, making for clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @ 8s, still workable at Bantham, Bovisand Reef, and Challborough with similar light winds. Day after, expect a slight increase back to 4 ft @ 8s, with winds easing to 5 mph W, keeping it fun at all the good spots. Best: today.
